name_localized.en: Double Room, Shared Bathroom (Garden Flat - INNACTIVE)

short_description_localized.es: Double Room, Shared Bathroom (Garden Flat - INNACTIVE)

description_localized.en:
120-sq-foot (11-sq-meter) room with city views

Internet - Free WiFi
Entertainment - Digital channels
Food & Drink - Refrigerator and coffee/tea maker
Bathroom - Partially open bathroom, free toiletries, and a separate bathtub and shower
Practical - Iron/ironing board (on request)
Comfort - Daily housekeeping
Need to Know - No cribs (infant beds) or rollaway/extra beds available
